name: 3dmaskSVD
author: AFNI Developers
description: Computes the principal singular vector of the time series vectors extracted from the input dataset over the input mask

inputs.description: L2 normalize all time series before SVD
inputs.name: Normalize time series flag

inputs.description: Output singular vectors 0 .. a (default a=0 = first one only)
inputs.name: Singular vector output

inputs.description: Define the mask (default is entire dataset)
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Remove polynomial trend (default 0 if not specified)
inputs.name: Polynomial trend removal order

inputs.description: Time series to remove from the data before SVD-ization. You can give more than 1 '-ort' option. 'xx.1D' can contain more than 1 column.
inputs.name: Removing orthogonals time series

inputs.description: Alternative way to give the input dataset name
inputs.name: Alternative input dataset

output-files.description: Singular vector output redirected to this file
output-files.name: Singular vector output
